column2: "Oh, it's beautiful... It's almost too beautiful to eat. Surely it could become a weapon, too?"
"Even so, you're still going to hand them over, aren't you, <%me>? Of course you are, because you're such a good person."
"Don't worry, I won't let your hard work and goodwill go to waste."
"I WILL complete this dish. And I'll prove I can make it out of the galley!"
